Projects

Default of Credit Card Clients

Machine Learning Project

Built a classification model to predict whether a client will default on their credit card payment using logistic regression and decision tree algorithms. Includes data preprocessing, feature selection, model building, and evaluation.

GitHub: View Project

May 2024

To-Do List App

Full Stack Web Application

Designed and developed a dynamic To-Do List app with full CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) functionality using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and localStorage. Features include task editing, deletion, and mark-as-done toggle. Deployed via GitHub Pages.

Interests

Outside of academics, I enjoy exploring the world of technology, particularly trends in front-end and full-stack web development. I’m passionate about continuously improving my problem-solving skills through platforms like LeetCode and HackerRank.

I also enjoy playing strategic and multiplayer video games, which help sharpen my reflexes, critical thinking, and team coordination. When away from the screen, I spend time reading about emerging tech, personal growth, and digital innovation.
